column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////* Smoked Whitefish Ceaser salad. Really good
column2: and they were not sparse with the whitefish. I love whitefish
column3: and sometimes I think about the bagels with whitefish spread I used to get in college. This was solid
column4: a very strong flavor that made me remember just how much I like it. The combination of flavors was spot-on
column7: and a perfect amount of whitefish. This was a hit.
